documents.document: @Ryback22 fancy going one on one with my mate @thomo7483 he reckons he would get the 1-2-3

@mikeys93 in fact he is like a man down
@mikeys93 he looked decent going forward last season, shocking defender but offers nothing at all now playing at a higher level

Seriously don't see what MW does in Tavernier!
And MOH starting ahead of Waghorn is a mystery. Has hardly played him all season can only think he is putting MOH in the shop window

@markbrownser @thomo7483 @Karen_Conway doing the smeato while singing the sash

@mikeys93 @ClaireyMac24 I am a realist not a dreamer when a player performs well I will praise them but I'll slaughter them if deserves

@mikeys93 @ClaireyMac24 when they haven't seen him anaw but claim to watch all his games

@mikeys93 hardly if they are not good enough I will say rather than make out they are quality and they are also under performing
@mikeys93 aye he is lazy but he is better than anyone else we have
@talkSPORTDrive Nonsense you are talking about Mourinho Adrian! He has won 23 trophies including 2 champions leagues!! What has he to prove?
@talkSPORT the owner of Blackpool sounds totally and utterly delusional! The quicker Blackpool get rid of the better!
@thomo7483 aye I agree! It's in a mess the now depending on Taker, Goldberg and Lesnar for Rumble
@BlueBoyRFC72 exactly the point I've been trying to make! He should be given a bit part deal or even a player/youth coach
@WATPLOYALS but we should be getting more out of what we have a 2-3 high quality signings make the difference
@WATPLOYALS Aye I'm not saying they aren't im saying there two main players were there major signings which have taken to the next level
@CraigGPBFB he offers more than MOH, has more quality than Garner, Forrester seems to pick and choose when he can be bothered so best option
@WATPLOYALS I'm not saying they ain't a good team but it's Sinclair and Dembele who make the real difference with there quality
@parkovanbasten & let's be honest he hasn't been a world beater his career just a good solid pro so should be achievable for better quality
@parkovanbasten he should get a deal but as an impact player we should be signing someone better and a younger age
@JorgAlbertz1872 I don't think the system fits the players. Joey Barton is a prime example of that
@JorgAlbertz1872 MOH offers very little other than pace.
@CraigGPBFB and Miller did score two goals, first one was a cracking ball from Waghorn and 2nd was quick thinking on the part of hyndman
@CraigGPBFB I think Waghorn is lazy but I think he offers something that nobody else does
@parkovanbasten I do feel it's sad reflection on the rest of the squad if it wasn't for him and hill we would be in a terrible position
@parkovanbasten we can't keep praying that his age doesn't catch up on him because it happens to everyone
@parkovanbasten im not saying he hasn't been good but this give him a 2yr deal, most important signing is crap, we need to replace him
@WATPLOYALS they not as good as everyone thinks,they made 2 major signings that make difference. We should be getting more out what we have
@JorgAlbertz1872 also true but I felt it was a Waghorn who changed the game, should be starting as he offers another dimension we don't have
@WATPLOYALS you are joking? Some of the performances have been horrific it's a sad state of affairs our two best players are over 35
I've nothing against the man but we need to be building a new team not revolving it around a 37yr old.
@JorgAlbertz1872 he did, but he done nothing at all before that, even missed a decent chance which he didn't even connect with the ball
@WATPLOYALS and I haven't overly rated him as a player his entire career I think it's a reflection on how bad the rest have been
@WATPLOYALS he is one of the few but it's time to start looking to replace him rather than keep relying on him, his legs will go soon enough
@mikeys93 that is a sad reflection on the rest of our mid. goes missing in games then gets injured if hull bid 1.5 I would drive him myself
Don't understand this love in for Miller at minute. He is 37yr old we need to look to future and it was Waghorn who changed the game on sat
